```{r}
data(trees)
plot(trees$Volume, trees$Girth)
pairs(trees)
```
```{r}
lm1 <- lm(Girth ~ Volume + Height, data=trees)
slm1 <- summary(lm1)
lm1
slm1
```

```{r}
mylm1 <- mylm(Girth ~ Volume + Height, data=trees)
smylm1 <- summary(mylm1)
mylm1
smylm1
```

```{r}
plot(lm1)
plot(mylm1)
```
